page.title: 09The church in Thurlow
page.content: The parish's new young rector inherits 3 churches of which St Peter's in Little Thurlow lies in this area. They alternately share the services of Communion, Mattins and Evensong, plus an innovative Family service. Its lively and original content illustrates the church's aim of encouraging young families to worship alongside its more established members. The first family service celebrated the church's own birthday with a card signed by the whole congregation and a cake made by the children. A stewardship campaign is starting in which church and congregation together look at their beliefs and commitments and how to put them into practice with available finance and resources to benefit families, neighbours and the church.
